aside.div: Fix: forgot to install kfcgi(8). Add flag to kfcgi(8) to specify the connection backlog. Add khttp_fcgi_test(3) to see if an application should use the FastCGI or regular CGI functions. A regression noted by James Turner (thanks!): re-add the CGI sample, sample.c, into the distributed source. There is also a FastCGI sample, sample-fcgi.c. There is also a non-kcgi sample, sample-cgi.c, used in creating the performance graphs.
